text: The best way to do this is to build the new theme and use Content Staging to migrate your website content. There isn't an automatic way to apply a new theme to existing content.

Hi <@UBNBAAQSH> when you open the global footer for POWER theme, there are four page types listed, including system page so that it can be modified independently, so while you can't open a system page to access it, and it's a little tricky to preview, you can build the footer all in the same place.

You shouldn't need to modify the system page templates unless you're customizing the code.

<https://www.maka-agency.com/documentation/global-footer-settings|Here is the footer documentation for reference>.
